terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.introduction: Welcome to FreightFlow Pro. By using our services, you agree to these terms. Please read them carefully.

children.text: These terms govern your use of FreightFlow Pro's freight brokerage and logistics services.
FreightFlow Pro provides freight brokerage services, connecting shippers with qualified carriers for the transportation of goods.

serviceTerms.title: Freight Brokerage Services
serviceTerms.description: Our core brokerage services include carrier selection, rate negotiation, and shipment coordination.
conditions: Carriers must maintain required insurance coverage
Shippers must provide accurate shipment details
Payment terms are net 30 days unless otherwise specified

serviceTerms.title: Technology Platform
serviceTerms.description: Access to our digital platform for shipment management and tracking.
conditions: Platform availability is subject to maintenance windows
Data usage is governed by our privacy policy

liabilityLimitations.title: Service Liability
liabilityLimitations.description: FreightFlow Pro's liability is limited to the scope of services provided as a broker.

liabilityLimitations.title: Force Majeure
liabilityLimitations.description: We are not liable for delays or failures due to circumstances beyond our reasonable control.

disputeResolution.process: Any disputes will first be addressed through direct negotiation.
disputeResolution.jurisdiction: All disputes shall be governed by the laws of the State of Texas.
disputeResolution.arbitration: Unresolved disputes shall be settled by binding arbitration.

terminationClauses.title: Service Termination
conditions: Either party may terminate with 30 days written notice

seo.title: Terms of Service | FreightFlow Pro
seo.description: Read our terms of service to understand your rights and responsibilities when using FreightFlow Pro's freight brokerage services.
